title: Server is busy
body: So recently i have been having trouble logging in, and just today It came up with a box saying "The server is currently busy. Please try again later."

replies.body:
Hi all,

We've made some changes on our end to hopeful address the issues for Optus players. 

Unfortunately, due to the nature of these types of problem, it's mostly a stab in the dark for us. *fingers crossed*
I logged in, had a game of coop vs ai and it all worked and went well, the only problem is my client will not login to chat services at all. But everything else seems to be working.

> [{quoted}](name=Skywocket,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=f3VFuuEe,comment-id=00120000,timestamp=2016-05-03T11:30:03.417+0000)
>
> I logged in, had a game of coop vs ai and it all worked and went well, the only problem is my client will not login to chat services at all. But everything else seems to be working.

Thanks for the update, I'll look into it further

> [{quoted}](name=Jimz,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=f3VFuuEe,comment-id=001200000000,timestamp=2016-05-03T11:33:03.881+0000)
>
> Thanks for the update, I'll look into it further

It's done. Please try chat again :-)

> [{quoted}](name=Jimz,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=f3VFuuEe,comment-id=0012000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-03T11:37:02.386+0000)
>
> It's done. Please try chat again :-)

Chat is working! Good work and thank you for your efforts. :)

get no internet at all at sunshine coast and it drops in and out all over brisbane such a load of shit :| and tbh telstra is cheaper now anyway time to make some abusive phone calls to get out of my contracts
it sounds like it powow..so done with these optus C**TS such bs

We're looking to see where the issues are at the moment.  

So we can narrow it down, can you guys try opening the following two URLs in a web browser.  If it is working correctly, it should show a blank white page.  Let me know if one/both of these fail to load for you:

* https://lq.oc1.lol.riotgames.com/
* https://prod.oc1.lol.riotgames.com:2099/

If you could also post your ISP that would be awesome.

Cheers
Mindstar

> [{quoted}](name=Agent Mindstar,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=f3VFuuEe,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2016-05-03T07:27:31.406+0000)
>
> We're looking to see where the issues are at the moment.  
> 
> So we can narrow it down, can you guys try opening the following two URLs in a web browser.  If it is working correctly, it should show a blank white page.  Let me know if one/both of these fail to load for you:
>

> * https://prod.oc1.lol.riotgames.com:2099/
> 
> If you could also post your ISP that would be awesome.
> 
> Cheers
> Mindstar

49.197.211.114
optus.

> [{quoted}](name=sp4nkmyp3nguin,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=f3VFuuEe,comment-id=000a0000,timestamp=2016-05-03T07:36:19.819+0000)
>
> 49.197.211.114
> optus.

neither page loaded for me but I dont have a firewall blocking lol or anything and im running optus mobile internet. 
so seems to be a trend with optus

Thanks very much for the info - 

Further question - are you guys using mobile broadband?  Or some kind of fixed line (adsl/cable)?
mobile

Thanks for the updates.  I've heard about this in [another thread recently](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/zh5Lu5sA-optus-wifi-hanging-at-logging-on).

Can you guys provide a [trace route](https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200169336-How-do-I-run-a-traceroute-) from your pc to prod.oc1.lol.riotgames.com and share the result?

Cheers
Mindstar
So what I gathered from that related thread was that this is an Optus problem and there is no known fix for it other then patience?

mobile broadband mate

I'm getting the same message, was working fine last night/ealier this morning but now it's just giving me that message.

EDIT: I seem to have fixed it by changing servers..I changed to EUNE logged into an account I had (which worked, I logged in) then I hopped back to OCE and logged in normally, so anyone having this issue can try that.
Kind of frustrating, I can log onto my NA account but then I switch back to OCE and it still doesn't work.

The first link loaded with a blank white page.
The second link: "https://prod.oc1.lol.riotgames.com:2099/" failed to load. 
ISP: Optus
I can successfully login on Telstra internet, however with Optus I just get the "login status: logging on..." screen forever.

I have this issue. I after getting server busy I close the error box, try to log again and the is just stays at "Login status:Logging on....". I left it for 20 mins and it still didn't login. It's been like this for 4 hours. Which sucks as I don't get much game time during the week, because life.

Well, Mindstar is aware and will take care of it. It's a good felling when you know Rito has staff whom reciprocate so quickly.
yeah servers are busy.. or it attempts to log in but cant get into the actual client  :((((((((((

The issue just occurred for me but I was already logged in and I opened up my browser and decided to go back to league to queue up but it opened a white screen so I closed league and then re-opened the game but now it keeps saying servers are busy when I try to log in.
Same problem, it's actually annoying because I really want to play rn.
Yeah I am getting the same problem on both my accounts atm. Never got this error message before and when the message doesn't show up it just says "logging in" then doesn't log in
When did it start happening?
Only started today, about the same time this post was put up. I left it for awhile but its still not logging in. Sent a ticket as well

SO I logged on last night and it was fine, get home from work today and now all i'm getting is:
 "The server is busy. Please try again later." 

...

Help?
I'm not aware of anything specific that might have caused this - is this error message something you see regularly? Or was this one just today?
Same problem with me, I'm sure it's getting fixed or something and should work later tonight/tomorrow maybe?
